channel.title: CreativeScape Help?
channel.description:
I Have the Server, Client, And Cache Folder Here [IMG]http://hosting11.imagecross.com/image-hosting-46/9494shard.png[/img]
I don't know what to do from here? Do I put the Cache folder in my C:? Did I name is correctly is it called "Cache"? Do I stick it in with the client folder?
I need detailed instructions.

item.title: CreativeScape Help?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Go into your client and find signlink.java (if it has one) Put the contents on pastebin.com, and reply here with the link, I will tell you where to put the cache from that.

As for the server-end, it will be much quicker if I just give you a link to a tutorial (same concept for all servers)

Read full topic
